definition: life is but a dream (idiom)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
as/as if/such as
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Then it is, perhaps, that life is a dream.
sentences.chinese: 这可能就是所谓的人生如梦吧。

sentences.english: Life is a dream , dream it.
Life, what is it but a dream?
Life is but a dream, be endless , be also brief.
sentences.chinese: 人生如梦，是漫长的，也是简短的。

sentences.english: Dreaming all these years, finally the right decision.
sentences.chinese: 历经多年人生如梦，最后终于领悟生命的真谛。

sentences.english: A man grey before his time.
sentences.chinese: 人生如梦，一樽还酹江月。

sentences.english: Life is as short as a dream;
sentences.chinese: 人生如梦，珍惜才能永恒。

sentences.english: After all, life is just like a dream.
The life like dream, comes in a hurry, the twinkling of an eye several years passed by.
sentences.chinese: 人生如梦，来来匆匆，一眨眼就十几年过去了。
